meanings.definition: To provide too much entertainment or amusement to someone.
meanings.sent1: She overentertained her guests with games and music all night long.
meanings.sent2: The children were overentertained at the birthday party and didn't want to leave.
meanings.sent3: The clown overentertained the audience with his silly jokes and tricks.
meanings.sent4: The movie overentertained me to the point where I lost track of time.
meanings.sent5: The theme park overentertained visitors with thrilling rides and live shows.

meanings.sent1: After the exciting concert, I felt overentertained and couldn't sleep.
meanings.sent2: The kids were overentertained after a day at the amusement park.
meanings.sent3: She looked overentertained after watching back-to-back movies all day.
meanings.sent4: The overentertained audience clapped and cheered for the amazing performance.
meanings.sent5: The overentertained puppy wagged its tail happily after playing with its favorite toy.
